participant_1.background:
I love the rain because it gives me an excuse to stay indoors and read my romance novels.
I love to go to the deli because I can get a sandwich that is both delicious and affordable.
i wait tables at a cafe.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i have long fingers.

participant_2.background:
I'm an active person who enjoys working with my hands and spending time outdoors.
I love to take weekend trips to explore new places and write about my experiences.
i like collecting rocks.
I love to sing karaoke and get my heart rate up with archery.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just got back from a weekend trip to the mountains. How about you?
I'm good, just got off work. I love the mountains, I'm jealous!
They're so beautiful, I'm glad I got to go. I went rock climbing and hiking, it was so much fun.
That sounds awesome, I've always wanted to try rock climbing.
You totally should! It's really fun and a great workout.
I will have to look into it. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to sing karaoke, and I also like to go archery.
Karaoke is so much fun, I used to go all the time in college.
Me too! I love to sing pop music, but I'm not very good at it.
That's okay, no one is good at karaoke!
Thanks, I appreciate it. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go to the deli, and spend time with my friends and family.
I love to read too! I'm always reading a book.
Me too! I'm reading a romance novel right now.
That sounds good, I love romance novels.
Do you have any favorite authors?
I love Nicholas Sparks and Danielle Steel.
I've read a few books by Nicholas Sparks, they're really good.
Yeah, he's my favorite author.
What's your favorite book by him?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say The Notebook.
That's a good one.
Yeah, it's so romantic.
I'm glad you like it!
Me too!
